biotools.summary:
A Web-Based Interactive Program for High-Dimensional Analysis of Molecular Alterations in Cancer.

HDMAC is a web-based shiny App that provides high-dimension regression analysis for both survival (Cox PH regression) and binary outcomes (logistic regression), including ridge, lasso, adaptive lasso regression analysis. Users can use this App to do high dimensional regression analysis online without downloading or installing any software. In ad….
